com.netflix.genie.core.jobs.workflow.impl

Class GenieBaseTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.core.jobs.workflow.impl.GenieBaseTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowTask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationTask, ClusterTask, CommandTask, InitialSetupTask, JobFailureAndKillHandlerLogicTask, JobKickoffTask, JobTask

    public abstract class GenieBaseTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkflowTask
    An abstract class that all classes that implement a workflow task should inherit from. Provides some helper methods that all classes can use.
    Since:
    3.0.0

      • buildLocalFilePath

        protected java.lang.String buildLocalFilePath(@NotBlank
                                              java.lang.String dir,
                                              @NotBlank
                                              java.lang.String id,
                                              @NotBlank
                                              java.lang.String filePath,
                                              @NotNull
                                              FileType fileType,
                                              @NotNull
                                              AdminResources adminResources)
                                       throws GenieException
        Helper Function to fetch file to local dir.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory where to copy the file
        id - The id to be appended to the destination path
        filePath - Source file path
        fileType - Type of file like setup, config or dependency
        adminResources - Entity type Application, Cluster, Command or Job
        Returns:
        Local file path constructed where the file is copied to
        Throws:
        GenieException - If there is any problem

        genieDir - The genie directory in the cwd for the job

        adminResources - The type of entity Application, Cluster or Command
